mapper.sql: select gOrder.ID AS ID, gOrder.CODE AS CODE, gOrder.STATUS AS STATUS, gOrder.SAMPLE_TYPE AS SAMPLE_TYPE, gOrder.CREATE_TIME AS CREATE_TIME, gOrder.CREATOR_NAME AS CREATOR_NAME, gOrder.ACTUAL_PRICE AS ACTUAL_PRICE, gOrder.SUBMITOR_NAME AS SUBMITOR_NAME, gOrder.SUBMIT_TIME AS SUBMIT_TIME, gOrder.UPDATOR_NAME AS UPDATOR_NAME, gCustomer.ID AS CUSTOMER_ID, gOrder.REPORT_GENERATE_TIME AS REPORT_GENERATE_TIME, gOrder.REPORT_PRINT_REQUIRED AS REPORT_PRINT_REQUIRED, gOrder.REPORT_DOWNLOAD_COUNT AS REPORT_DOWULOAD_COUNT, gCustomer.NAME AS CUSTOMER_NAME, gCustomer.PHONE AS CUSTOMER_PHONE, gCustomer.SEX AS CUSTOMER_SEX, gCustomer.EMAIL AS CUSTOMER_EMAIL, gAgency.ID AS AGENCY_ID, gAgency.NAME AS AGENCY_NAME, gAgency.CONTACT_PHONE AS AGENCY_CONTACT_PHONE, gtProduct.ID AS PRODUCT_ID, gtProduct.NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME, gtProduct.CODE AS PRODUCT_CODE, gtProduct.GUIDING_PRICE AS PRODUCT_GUIDING_PRICE, gOrder.REPORT_GENERATE_TASK AS REPORT_GENERATE_TASK FROM ghealth_order gOrder LEFT JOIN ghealth_customer gCustomer ON gOrder.CUSTOMER_ID = gCustomer.ID LEFT JOIN ghealth_agency gAgency ON gOrder.AGENCY_ID = gAgency.ID LEFT JOIN ghealth_testing_product gtProduct ON gOrder.PRODUCT_ID = gtProduct.ID LEFT JOIN ghealth_order_report_generate_task gTask ON gOrder.REPORT_GENERATE_TASK = gTask.ID
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ghealth_order o WHERE o.REPORT_GENERATE_TASK = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND o.DELETED = 0
mapper.insert: insert into ghealth_order (ID, PRODUCT_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, AGENCY_ID, CODE, ACTUAL_PRICE, STATUS, SUBMIT_TIME, SUBMITOR_NAME, CREATE_TIME, CREATOR_NAME, REPORT_GENERATE_TIME,UPDATE_TIME, UPDATOR_NAME, DELETED, DELETE_TIME, DELETOR_NAME) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{product.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customer.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agency.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actualPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{submitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{submitorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportGenerateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deletorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

INSERT INTO GHEALTH_ORDER
ID,
PRODUCT_ID,
CUSTOMER_ID,
AGENCY_ID,
CODE,
ACTUAL_PRICE,
STATUS,
SUBMIT_TIME,
SUBMITOR_NAME,
CREATE_TIME,
CREATOR_NAME,
REPORT_GENERATE_TIME,
REPORT_DOWNLOAD_COUNT,
DELETED,
REPORT_PRINT_REQUIRED,
SAMPLE_TYPE,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{product.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{customer.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{agency.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{actualPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{submitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{submitorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{reportGenerateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{reportDownloadCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{deleted,jdbcType=BIT},
#{reportPrintRequired,jdbcType=BIT},
#{sampleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
UPDATE GHEALTH_ORDER
PRODUCT_ID = #{product.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_ID = #{customer.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENCY_ID = #{agency.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTUAL_PRICE = #{actualPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBMIT_TIME = #{submitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SUBMITOR_NAME = #{submitorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATOR_NAME = #{updatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT},
DELETE_TIME = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETOR_NAME = #{deletorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPORT_GENERATE_TASK = #{reportGenerateTaskId},
REPORT_GENERATE_TIME = #{reportGenerateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REPORT_PRINT_REQUIRED = #{reportPrintRequired,jdbcType=BIT},
REPORT_DOWNLOAD_COUNT = #{reportDownloadCount, jdbcType=INTEGER},
SAMPLE_TYPE = #{sampleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update ghealth_order set STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATOR_NAME = #{updatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ghealth_order gOrder LEFT JOIN ghealth_customer gCustomer ON gOrder.CUSTOMER_ID = gCustomer.ID LEFT JOIN ghealth_agency gAgency ON gOrder.AGENCY_ID = gAgency.ID LEFT JOIN ghealth_testing_product gtProduct ON gOrder.PRODUCT_ID = gtProduct.ID

SELECT t.ID, t.CODE, t.STATUS FROM GHEALTH_ORDER t
WHERE 1 = 2
WHERE t.CODE =
#{code}
WHERE t.CODE IN
#{code}
AND t.STATUS BETWEEN 3 AND 5 AND t.DELETED = 0
SELECT code FROM ghealth_order WHERE DELETED = 0
where gOrder.CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND gOrder.STATUS!=6 AND gOrder.DELETED = 0
SELECT DATA_DETAILS FROM ghealth_order_testing_data WHERE ORDER_ID=#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select gOrder.Id FROM ghealth_order gOrder WHERE gOrder.AGENCY_ID = #{agencyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND gOrder.DELETED = 0 ORDER BY gOrder.CREATE_TIME DESC
WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT c.ID FROM `ghealth_customer` c WHERE gOrder.CUSTOMER_ID = c.ID AND gOrder.DELETED = 0 AND gCustomer.DELETED = 0 AND c.PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT s.STORAGE_DETAILS, s.STORAGE_TYPE, s.ID FROM ghealth_order o LEFT JOIN ghealth_order_report_generate_task t INNER JOIN ghealth_object_storage s ON t.PDF_FILE_URL = s.ID ON o.REPORT_GENERATE_TASK = t.ID WHERE o.id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT s.STORAGE_DETAILS, s.STORAGE_TYPE, s.ID FROM ghealth_order o LEFT JOIN ghealth_order_report_generate_task t INNER JOIN ghealth_object_storage s ON t.WORD_FILE_URL = s.ID ON o.REPORT_GENERATE_TASK = t.ID WHERE o.id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT DISTINCT l.`NAME` FROM ghealth_order o LEFT JOIN ghealth_product_item p ON p.PRODUCT_ID = o.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN ghealth_testing_item_locus item ON item.TESTING_ITEM_ID = p.TESTING_ITEM_ID LEFT JOIN ghealth_locus l ON l.ID = item.LOCUS_ID WHERE o.DELETED = '0' AND l.DELETED = '0' AND o.ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select GROUP_CONCAT(gOrder.CODE SEPARATOR ',') AS CODE FROM ghealth_order gOrder LEFT JOIN ghealth_customer gCustomer ON gOrder.CUSTOMER_ID =gCustomer.ID LEFT JOIN ghealth_agency gAgency ON gOrder.AGENCY_ID = gAgency.ID WHERE gOrder.DELETED = 0 AND gOrder.STATUS != 0 AND gOrder.STATUS != 6 GROUP BY gCustomer.NAME,gAgency.ID HAVING COUNT(gCustomer.NAME) > 1
